p:
In animal model of allergic asthma, cyclooxygenase and 5-lipoxygenase pathways of rat peritoneal leukocytes inhibited by N. sativa fixed oil, by inhibition of thromboxane B 2 and leukotriene B 4 metabolites
17 . Lung inflammation was improved and peripheral blood eosinophil count was decreased by N. sativa fixed oil
18 . Oral administration of fixed oil in animal models significantly decreased the leukocyte, platelet counts
19 .
